translated: The Story of the Petas in the Tree of Angulimala
“What one gives is not what one gets;

analyzed: dethā iva dānam da tvā ubhayam tarati
translated: Having given a gift, one crosses over both;
By that gift one goes to both,
Be watchful, do not be heedless.”
The Story of the Petas in the Tree of Angulimala is the thirteenth.
